rec.high_death_rate: Your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) is above the ideal threshold (<0.3). Review boss mechanics and improve positioning.
rec.good_survival: Great survival! Your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) is very low.
rec.high_damage_boss: You take significantly more damage on {{boss}} ({{dtps}} DTPS) compared to your average ({{avgDtps}} DTPS).
rec.improving_survival: Your survival is improving! Deaths decreased by {{change}}% in recent weeks.
rec.worsening_survival: Your death rate has increased by {{change}}% recently. Review what's causing extra deaths.
rec.low_health_potion: You use health potions in only {{rate}}% of fights. Aim for >50% to improve survival.
rec.no_healthstone: You use healthstones in only {{rate}}% of fights. They're free healing â€” use them more!
rec.low_combat_potion: Combat potion usage is at {{rate}}%. Using potions in >70% of fights significantly boosts your output.
rec.low_flask: Your flask uptime is {{uptime}}%. Keep it above 90% for consistent performance.
rec.no_food: Food buff active in only {{rate}}% of fights. Always eat before pulls!
rec.good_consumables: Excellent consumable usage! You're well-prepared for every fight.
rec.dps_improving: Your DPS has improved by {{change}}% in recent weeks. Keep it up!
rec.dps_declining: Your DPS has decreased by {{change}}% recently. Check for gear, rotation, or mechanics issues.
rec.below_raid_median: Your DPS is at {{pct}}% of the raid median. Focus on your rotation and uptime.
rec.above_raid_median: Great performance! Your DPS is {{pct}}% above the raid median.
rec.inconsistent_dps: Your DPS varies by {{variance}}% across bosses. Some encounters may need specific optimization.
rec.low_interrupts: You average only {{avg}} interrupts per fight. Try to interrupt more when possible.
rec.good_interrupts: Great utility! You average {{avg}} interrupts per fight.
